post.content:
We have several position available now so; please send your resume @ alexna2003@yahoo.com.

  The following positions are opening now:

  Controller
  CFO
  Sr. Sales Engineer (Network)
  Inside Sales Representatives
  QA Analyst
  Sales Manger
  Reliability Engineer
  Sr. Software Developer


Company announced 2nd Career Fair that will take place on Tues, October 5th from 12:00 pm - 8:00 pm at the Sheraton Parkway (Hwy 7 and Leslie).
post.title: Job Fair at the Sherato Parkway (Hwy 7 & Leslie) on Tues
